Dr O
Yasin B-PER
Olum I-PER
of O
Makerere B-ORG
University I-ORG
Political I-ORG
Science I-ORG
department I-ORG
says O
Uganda's O
politics O
has O
become O
transactional O
, O
is O
no O
longer O
a O
service O
and O
Museveni B-PER
will O
use O
it O
to O
maximum O
advantage O
Dr O
. O
Yasin B-PER
Olum I-PER
ow'omu O
Yunivasite B-ORG
y'e I-ORG
Makerere I-ORG
mu O
kitongole O
ekisomesa O
eby'obufuzi O
agamba O
nti O
eby'obufuzi O
bwa O
Uganda B-LOC
bifuuse O
bya O
busuubuzi O
, O
kuno O
tekukyali O
kuweereza O
bantu O
era O
kino O
Museveni B-PER
ajja O
kukikozesa O
nnyo O
kiganyula O
ye O
. O

President O
Museveni B-PER
will O
definitely O
achieve O
his O
immediate O
objective O
, O
which O
is O
keeping O
himself O
in O
power O
Pulezidenti O
Museveni B-PER
ajja O
kutuukiriza O
ekyo O
ky'ayagala O
, O
nga O
kino O
kwe O
kwenywereza O
mu O
buyinza O
. O

" O
Olum B-PER
, O
who O
